message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm asking for $12,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I believe we can come to an agreement closer to my valuation of $8,000. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Hi Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your valuation, but I'm hoping for something a little closer to $10,000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm still very interested in the product, but I'm unable to go above $9,000. Could we perhaps meet somewhere in the middle?
